name: Boa Hancock
types: The Seven Warlords of the Sea/Kuja Pirates
text: On Play: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck; reveal up to 1 red Event card or [Monkey.D.Luffy] and put it into your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order. Activate: Main: You may trash this Character. Give up to 2 rested DON!! cards to 1 of your Leader or Character cards.

effect.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck; reveal up to 1 red Event card or [Monkey.D.Luffy] and put it into your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.
You may trash this Character. Give up to 2 rested DON!! cards to 1 of your Leader or Character cards.
